titles.title: TRICARE Prescription Relief Act
TRICARE Prescription Relief Act

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to temporarily waive cost-sharing amounts under the TRICARE pharmacy benefits program during certain declared emergencies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
TRICARE Prescription Relief Act
This bill allows the Department of Defense (DOD) to waive cost-sharing requirements under the TRICARE pharmacy benefits program during a declared national or public health emergency, a designated major disaster or emergency, or an emergency as determined by DOD.
